Items.Value: This module requires all connectors to be connected to your ship. Please check that all connectors connect to the ship.
This module has a power conduit. It must be connected to another power conduit.
This module has a water pipe. It must be connected to another water pipe.
This module has an atmosphere connector. It must be connected to another atmosphere connector.
This module has a waste pipe. It must be connected to another waste pipe.
This module has a thermal transfer pipe. It must be connected to another thermal transfer pipe.
This module has a human transportation connector. It must be connected to another human transportation connector.
